Name: Longinus Zone
Desc:
Draws 6 Spear of God, Longinus and bombards a large area with attacks.
Required Skill: Craft: Longinus Lv. 30 or above

H.Old:
MP Cost: 200. Causes 4 explosions, each attacking up to 12 enemies at 1500% Damage 3 times.
Makes you Invincible while being cast.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 200. Activates 4 explosions that attack up to 12 enemies at 1500% Damage 3 times.
Makes you Invincible while it's cast.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
